wordpressPage.content:
Legge House – Wiltshire – Website Legge House is a Christian youth residential centre in Wiltshire. They can sleep up to 36 and have comfortable meeting rooms and lounges aswell as good size gardens. Legge House is easily accessible being 15 minutes from junctions 15 and 16 of the M4. Please visit their website for more information.

The Beacon – Exmoor National Park, North Devon – Website The Beacon is a centre offering a range of options ideal for youth residentials. The centre can sleep up to 41 people in a variety of dorms and they can even offer some Christian sessions ideal for church groups. Contact the centre for more information.

Scout Activity Centre (open to other groups) – Woodhouse Park – Website

Woodhouse Park Scout Activity Centre is enclosed by picturesque woodland, yet easily accessible from the M4 and M5, yet is set in peaceful countryside. With stunning views over the Severn bridges, the centre is perfectly situated for exploring the Cotswolds, the Mendips and the Wye Valley as well as the historic cities of Bristol and Bath. Woodhouse Park has 2 purpose built self-catering buildings ideal for youth groups as well as a range of onsite activities from high ropes to orienteering.

Scout Activity Centre (open to other groups) – Youlbury – Website

Youlbury offers both indoor accommodation as well as camping set in 42 acres of woodland in rural Oxfordshire, , including two brand new state of the art self-catering buildings designed specifically for use by youth organisations.  There are also a wide range of both high adrenaline and more traditional activities, from the 3G swing to backwoods cooking, abseiling to orienteering.

Wellington Academy, North Wiltshire

The Wellington Academy is a unique, modern academy, set in a 22-acre community campus in Tidworth, Wiltshire. The state of the art accommodation sleeps 100 in 36 en suite singles, 20 doubles and 6 quads, making us a perfect venue for any residential stays. The boarding house can be split equally between males and females. We can offer fully catered or adapt to your requirements.

The main building offers a light filled atrium exhibition space, a 320 seat theatre and class rooms with Promethean white boards. There is wireless IT across the campus. There is a dance room with a mirrored wall and a drama room. We also have a sports centre with a full size, floodlit, all-weather 3G pitch, tennis courts, badminton, tennis courts and grass pitches.

We also have several seating areas, picnic benches, canopied areas and we can also provide a gas barbecue. 

Video tour of school and boarding facilities

Booking Information
From £25 per night per person without catering. Breakfast, lunch, dinner and evening snack is £10 per day. We will happily accommodate groups of 40 – 100. Please contact us with your group requirements.
